item.title: Love is Hard
item.description: To Will The Good In The Other I watched a youtube video once about “what is love?”. I listened to a Roman Catholic Bishop discuss St. Thomas Acquinas' understanding of love. To will the good in the other.. to let go of oneself in order to will for good in the person that one loves. This is hard. Love is Hard I am living through one of those periods in my life where I have to overcome myself in order to meet the demands of reality.
